name: Pi Video Server (PiFlix)
desc: Utilizing Socket.io and Node.js, PiFlix is the perfect solution for uploading and streaming mp4 videos on your local network. PiFlix was intended to run on a Raspberry Pi connected to your router. All you have to do is visit the Pi's IP in any web browser.

name: Wizard Ball
desc: A quick real time 4 player game. Wizard Ball was my groups 'Hello World' for web development and server side programming. All programming was approached in an Agile manner.

name: DnD Digitized
desc: My UB Hacking 2015 project. DnD Digitized was my groups attempt to streamline character sheets and the battle encounters for Dungeons and Dragons.

name: OS161
desc: Class project for Operating Systems. OS161 is a linux based operating system that we wrote system calls, synchronization primatives, and multithreading for.
